"The finished product is beautiful and they were a great company to work with!" "The remodel exceeded our expectations and we would highly recommend his company!" "Our pool has been fully restored and it’s a brand new pool and looks GREAT."

We had a major pool problem and we called around and got several quotes for the needed repairs. All were extremely expensive but we found North Texas Pool Remodeling for help and they came through for us in a big way. Monty's crew did great work!  Replaced the tile in our pool in one day.  Reasonable price.  Quality work.  No mess.  Would highly recommend North Texas Pool Remodeling! Response from the owner a year ago Thank you Mike for the opportunity to work on your pool and for this review.

We highly recommend North Texas Pool Remodeling.  Monty Davis and his crew did an excellent job in replacing all the tile and replastering our 40+ year old pool.  It looks brand new and we love it.  He is very honest, very dependable and … More
